name.baseName: Remediated soil ; In situ remediation ; Electrochemical remediation ; 15-day treatment
修复后土壤;原位修复;电化学修复;处理15天

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: An electric field is applied to electrodes placed in soil producing many chemical, electrochemical, electrokinetic and thermal changes, reduce the impact of the pollutants contained in the soil, depleting them from soil or transforming them into less hazardous species.
将电场施加到放置在土壤中的电极上，产生许多化学、电化学、电动和热变化，减少土壤中所含污染物的影响，将其从土壤中消耗掉或转化为危害较小的物种。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: Soil polluted with 150 mg of 2,4-D per kg of dry soil remediation after 15 days of treatment.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The powered directly by the grid, worked at potentiostatic mode, providing a constant potential gradient of 1.0 V cm−1 .
土壤修复活动直接由电网供电，在恒电位模式下工作，提供1.0 V cm−1的恒定电位梯度。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This process is applied for in situ soil remediation to reduce contaminants such as pesticides to a lesser degree of hazard. The electrochemical treatment is designed to treat soil polluted with organic compounds, specifically targeting remediation of soils contaminated with 2,4-D pesticide. It is optimal for scenarios where pollutants need to be depleted or chemically transformed directly within the site without excavation and transport, ensuring minimal disruption to the surrounding environment.
该过程用于原位土壤修复，以减少农药等污染物的危害程度。电化学处理旨在治疗被有机化合物污染的土壤，特别是针对受2,4-D农药污染的土壤修复。在需要直接在现场降解或化学转化污染物，且无需挖掘和运输的情况下，这是最佳的选择，确保对周围环境的干扰最小化。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Fernández-Marchante C.M. et al. Can the green energies improve the sustainability of electrochemically-assisted soil remediation processes. Science of the Total Environment 803 (2022) 149991
Fernández-Marchante C.M. et al. Can the green energies improve the sustainability of electrochemically-assisted soil remediation processes. Science of the Total Environment 803 (2022) 149991

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data, consider the electrical source used for the electrochemical process, and ensure it is consistent with the original study to maintain accuracy. As the evaluation omits the reuse or recycling of electrode materials and the treatment of flushing effluent, adapt your LCA model to account for this if necessary. Additionally, since the study excludes oxidation of pesticides into CO2 and air pollution due to low evaporation, users should incorporate these considerations if these aspects are relevant to their assessment objectives. The distance between electrodes and their inert nature (graphite) should be taken into account as it influences oxidation potential and treatment efficiency. Lastly, the dataset is specific to soils contaminated with 150 mg/kg of 2,4-D; for other contaminants or concentrations, assumptions and results may vary and should be adjusted accordingly.

在使用此LCA数据时，考虑电化学过程使用的电源，并确保其与原始研究一致以保持准确性。由于评估省略了电极材料的再利用或回收以及修复后冲洗废水的处理，如有必要请在LCA模型中调整以考虑这些因素。此外，由于研究忽略了农药氧化成二氧化碳的过程和因蒸发量低而引起的空气污染，如果这些方面与评估目标相关，用户应将这些因素纳入考虑。电极之间的距离及其惰性（石墨）应当被考虑，因为它影响氧化潜力和处理效率。最后，数据集特定于受150 mg/kg 2,4-D污染的土壤；对于其他污染物或浓度，假设和结果可能会有所不同，应相应调整。

completeness.common:other: This study seeks to evaluate the environmental impacts associated with a soil remediation treatment from cradle to grave. It is worth mentioning that the reuse or recycling of the components of the studied setups have not been considered.The oxidation of pesticide to CO2 was not considered. The use of graphite as electrodes and the large distance between them, reduce the possibility of arising oxidation reactions during the treatment, because of oxidation of water and self-combustion of graphite are produced in an easier way than oxidation of organic compounds. - Air pollution as a consequence of pollutant evaporation was not taken into account because of the low evaporation flows observed in all the cases. - The treatment of the flushing effluent after the remediation was not considered.
本研究旨在评估从摇篮到坟墓的土壤修复处理对环境的影响。值得一提的是，尚未考虑对所研究装置的部件进行再利用或回收。没有考虑农药氧化为二氧化碳的问题。使用石墨作为电极及其之间的大距离，降低了处理过程中发生氧化反应的可能性，因为水的氧化和石墨的自燃比有机化合物的氧化更容易产生。-由于在所有情况下观测到的蒸发流量较低，因此未考虑污染物蒸发造成的空气污染。-未考虑修复后冲洗废水的处理。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
